'''Strider''' was a [[Ponies|pony]] acquired by [[Frodo Baggins]] in [[Minas Tirith]]. He named it "[[Strider]]" after [[Aragorn]]'s own nickname from [[Eriador]]. 

Strider rode with Frodo back to [[the Shire]] at the end of the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>{{RK|VI6}}</ref> Two years later he carried him westwards in the [[Last Riding of the Keepers of the Rings]] to the [[Grey Havens]] on the coast of the [[Belegaer|Great Sea]].<ref>{{RK|VI9}}</ref>
